forest-g3.title: Forest Clearing
text: A quiet clearing opens beneath a tangle of old branches.
A faint breeze ripples the surface of a nearby pond.
A lonely rock waits at the center of the clearing.

lookText.goblin: The rock looks throwable. Very throwable.
lookText.elf: A dull stoneâ€¦ but faintly touched by old magic.

lookText.goblin: A fish surfaces and you swear it's laughing at you.
lookText.elf: Clear water, touched by moonlight even during the day.
